title: How to Get Revives in Pokémon GO: Gameplay Tips and Tricks

steps.title: Open your daily free box.
steps.content: Open your daily free box. It has a chance of containing revives. You can open the daily free box in the shop. Note that revives will restore a Pokémon to half HP, while max revives restore full HP. You can also get more Poké Balls from the daily free box!

steps.title: Tap PokéStop and gym photo discs to get items.
steps.content: Tap PokéStop and gym photo discs to get items. Both of these have a chance to drop revives. Note that you need to be close enough to the PokéStops or gym to spin the photo disc. [1] X Research source Photo discs will turn purple after you spin them, indicating that they are on cooldown. They'll turn blue when they're ready to be spun again. Visiting gyms that are controlled by your team or that you've earned the badge for will reward you with additional bonus items.

steps.title: You can potentially get revives when opening gifts.
steps.content: You can potentially get revives when opening gifts. You will find new gifts in the Friends tab of the profile menu. You can change your username if you want your friends and other trainers to see you by a different name.

steps.title: Finish field research tasks to earn supplies.
steps.content: Finish field research tasks to earn supplies. Some research field tasks will reward you with revives. The item is listed next to the task in the field research task page. You can get new tasks by spinning PokéStops. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Joining and completing nearby raids will reward you with items.
steps.content: Joining and completing nearby raids will reward you with items. You can earn revives and other supplies by successfully finishing a raid. Make sure to change up your team as needed to bring your most powerful Pokémon to the raid!

steps.title: You'll get revives for each level between 5 and 29.
steps.content: You'll get revives for each level between 5 and 29. Then you'll earn max revives from levels 30 to 40. You can earn experience (XP) to level up by completing various game activities. Here are a few examples: [3] X Research source Capturing a Pokémon. Getting a new Pokédex entry. Evolving a Pokémon. Hatching an egg. Interacting with a PokéStop.

steps.title: You can use PokéCoins to buy max revives.
steps.content: You can use PokéCoins to buy max revives. While there aren't revives in the shop, you can buy max revives if you need more! You can get PokéCoins by using real money to make an in-app purchase.
